DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the therapy effect and security of oxaliplatin and fluorouracil on with or without concomitant vascular invasion and extrahepatic metastases unresectable advanced primary liver cancer
DOC.brief_title: Hepatic Arterial Infusion of Oxaliplatin and Fluorouracil Treatment of Advanced Primary Liver Cancer After TACE
